Package com.sleepysim

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Adversary
    This class operates the corrupted nodes.
    Node  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Block
    This class defines the block.
    Chain
    This class defines the block chain.
    Controller
    This class controls the network to run uninterruptedly and correctly.
    Corrupted_node
    This class definds and operates the corrupted nodes.
    Hash
    This class is used to get the hash.
    Honest_message
    This class defines the honest message.
    Honest_node
    This class definds and operates the honest nodes.
    Honest_node.Hash_elements
    This class defines the elements of the hash.
    Honest_node.Signature_elements
    This class defines the elements of the signature.
    Main
    This class is the main class.
    Message
    This class defines the context of message, which can be any type
    Message_to_send
    This class records message that intercepted by adversary, and provide sufficient additional information Adversary cannot change these parameters
    Naive_adversary
    This class implements the Naive_adversary algorithm
    A naive adversary, you should break consistency if you have more node than honest
    Network_control
    This class is the framework of the simulator.
    Selfish_adversary
    This class implements the Selfish_adversary algorithm
    A naive adversary, you should break consistency if you have more node than honest
    Selfish_Eclipse_attack
    This class implements the Selfish_adversary algorithm
    For a naive adversary, you should break consistency if you have more node than honest
    Signature_tool
    This class is designed for all the functions related with signature.
    Stubborn_adversary
    This class implements the Stubborn_adversary algorithm
    A naive adversary, you should break consistency if you have more node than honest
    To_byte_array
    This class change input into byte array
    Transaction
    This class defines the format of a transaction
